description.en:
Mori's bunny girls at their best.

One-shot originally released as part of a limited edition anthology, Aokishi Bunny, bundled with the third publication of the Aokishi magazine, and later published in another anthology, Rhapsody of Regrowth.

biography.en:
Kaoru Mori is a Japanese manga artist from Tokyo and the creator of the manga series Shirley, Emma, and Otoyomegatari. Many of her works are centered on female characters in the 19th century, such as a maid in Victorian Britain and a bride in Turkic Central Asia. 

Mori's works are known for their high level of detail in terms of clothing design, historical nuances, and background work. Her manga series are often published outside Japan in larger, hardbound editions to complement the heavy detail seen on every page.

[Source Wikipedia]
